modules.description: Provides cryptographic key derivation using the scrypt algorithm, with functions for generating and verifying keys. Operates on byte sequences and integers representing parameters like cost, block size, and parallelism. Used to securely derive encryption keys from passwords in authentication systems.

Encrypts and decrypts strings using the scrypt key derivation function, supporting configurable memory, time, and memory fraction constraints. Accepts passwords and data inputs, returning encrypted outputs or errors. Useful for securely storing credentials or sensitive data with adjustable security parameters.
